about_the_game:
Developed by former Halo and Call of Duty developers, Project Sentinel is an FPS game with a focus on social sandbox interactions. The following product is a 10-15 minute demo of a PvE-style campaign mission.

Looking into a glass that spies millennia into the future, humanity is now a powerful space-faring civilization. With constant expansion pushing further into the depths of space, humans conquered everything in their path, led by a dangerous and passionate ambition. At some point that blaze of glory seemed fated to come to an end. A coalition of alien species appeared and attacked, precision so swift and deadly that humanity is not only reminded of the taste of defeat but entirely swallowed by it. We were not prepared and Humanity lost. Based on Norse Vikings, the Varangians are a human faction that is composed of exiled militants and are no longer associated with any other human faction. They are a team of mercenaries without allegiance to any other faction.

Work with other human factions to push off the alien attack by killing aliens, defending humans, collecting items, and building your presence in the galaxy. Utilize your surroundings and environmental hazards to gain an edge and cause cascading chaos in the environment with lots of dynamic sandbox items in the environment. Utilize anything you can to gain the upper edge in this fight.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent violence, gunfights, and blood occur in the game. Light language is used.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2080 Super or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Project Sentinel is an FPS shooter game developed by former Halo and Call of Duty developers with a focus on social sandbox interactions. In the distant future, humanity has been attacked by an alien coalition. In a post-apocalyptic world, you must become a space viking, known as a Varangian.
